problem_text_cn: 如图,点O为小亮家的位置,他家门前有一条东西走向的公路,水塔A位于他家北偏东60°的500米处,那么水塔所在的位置到公路的距离是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, point O is the location of Xiaoliang's home. There is an east-west road in front of his house. Water tower A is located at N_1 of N_0 in the north east of his home. Then the distance between the location of the water tower and the road is ()
